General.Name: Siamrajathanee Public Company Limited
General.Description: Siamrajathanee Public Company Limited provides various outsourcing services to public and private sectors in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Outsourcing Services and Rental Services. The company offers personnel management services, including drivers, office workers, and technicians, as well as Academy, a professional driver training course; Valet parking, a parking service; Driver, a private chauffeur service; and training services. It also offers car rental services; Mr.Journey, a shuttle bus for wheelchair users; electronic information and document management systems; professional document scanning and record keeping services; landscape management; and tree trimming services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Phra Pradaeng, Thailand.
